title: Command Registration Configuration Schema
description: This schema defines the configuration properties for command registration.

clientId.description: Discord client ID for the bot.

guildId.description: Guid ID for when you want to register commands to a single guild. Does not do anything on its own without register for guild.

registerForGuild.description: Boolean flag to set if you want to register commands for a guild instead.

unregister.description: Boolean flag to simply unregister all commands instead of register them.
